verbose_text: O GlcNAcylation is catalyzed by the enzyme, O-GlcNAc transferase (OGT), which is responsible for the addition of O-GlcNAc using substrate UDP-N-acetylglucosamine (UDP-GlcNAc), which is reversed by the complementary O-GlcNAcase (OGA) for the hydrolytic cleavage of O-GlcNAc.
evidence: UDP-N-acetylglucosamine (UDP-GlcNAc), which is reversed by the complementary O-GlcNAcase (OGA
